attributes.action: Support low income people,homeless, visitor and zero hour contract  agency
attributes.additional_details: I think the local government should consider the  health of all and understand that not everyone are able to stock food due to financial difficulties. This crisis is affecting the all county and support should be provided to all including people from different countries locked in the United Kingdom during this crisis. Let shared one love and support each other
attributes.background: Look on how to found homeless,low income families and agency with zero hours contract. Including those who can't afford to buy food and supply bills during the coronavirus crisis

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to support people. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might want to sign the petition below calling for a universal basic income:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
